snippet: A shell or rocket that appeared to be aimed at an army checkpoint in southeastern Ukraine hit a bus. The episode came as plans for a peace summit meeting collapsed.
abstract: Shell or rocket hits army checkpoint in southeastern Ukraine, killing 10 people on bus; attack occurs as plans for peace summit meeting fall apart.
lead_paragraph: A shell or rocket that appeared to be aimed at an army checkpoint in southeastern Ukraine hit a bus. The episode came as plans for a peace summit meeting collapsed.

headline.main: 10 Are Killed in Ukraine as Diplomacy Hits a Wall
headline.print_headline: 10 Are Killed in Ukraine as Diplomacy Hits a Wall
